tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am delighted to share my heartfelt appreciation for Dr. Anubhava Jain, who provided exceptional care and support throughout my first pregnancy. From the joyous moment we discovered we were expecting to the safe delivery of our baby, Dr. Jain's expertise and compassionate approach made all the difference.

Throughout the pregnancy, Dr. Jain was consistently attentive and available, always taking the time to address our concerns and questions with patience and clarity. Her reassuring demeanor and thorough explanations helped ease any anxieties we had, making us feel confident and well-informed at every stage.

During the delivery, Dr. Jain's calm and professional presence was incredibly comforting. Her dedication to ensuring both my baby's and my well-being was evident in every decision and action she took. We felt truly cared for, knowing we were in the hands of a skilled and empathetic doctor.

Dr. Jain's combination of medical expertise and genuine compassion has made our first pregnancy experience a positive and memorable one. We are deeply grateful for her unwavering support and exceptional care.

‚ÄúI first time realised Dr is truly a God‚Äù

review: This was my second pregnancy. As soon as I knew about it i was nervous and scared but in my first ultrasound it was clear that i am pregnant with twins. I was so happy and so excited. But it was not so easy. There were so many complications. This journey was very difficult but it gone well because of my doctor Anubha mam . There were lots of tests and ultrasounds which irritated me so many times but i had faith on doctor. She treated me very well .she was always making sure that everything is going well. she always motivated me . My c section surgery was very good. My two baby boys were born so  healthy. Everything was well . I am so thankful to her.I will recommend this doctor to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Anubha is an amazing doctor. As pregnancy is that part of life where we have questions on everything and every moment here comes the best part as She is really calm and her explanation to every question will make you calm. We met her at Medha hospital pitampura, i should say she should change her hospital as the services at hospital is very poor. That hospital is running by the name of former Dr Anita Rajurkar who passed away last year.
In the late 7th month of pregnancy we were introduced to Dr Anubha not by choice but like it was last trimester and Dr Anita passed away so we had to continue our treatment with Dr Anubha but by god grace we never felt that we are not in safe hands. She is kind, soft and her smile will always give you comfort that you can relax in these days as well.
Lastly when everything was fine with a big thumps up for Dr Anubha jain only a small negative marking on big nails of Dr as my wife was little scared looking that.
I strongly refer Dr Anubha Jain.
